root.name: Dino Stalker
root.description: Details Dino Stalker was released in North America on September 9th 2002 on the PlayStation 2. Dino Stalker takes place in the Dino Crisis universe and is know in Japan as Gun Survivor 3: Dino Crisis. The game can be played with a Dual Shock 2 but a light gun is recommended. The Gun Survivor Series is an attempt to bridge light gun games and traditional games. Dino Stalker is the only Gun Survivor game that is not a Resident Evil spinoff.
